ygData.subject: D2 Kakis List
ygData.msgSnippet: Since D2 use acct name (instead of char name) to send tell, maybe we can maintain a list here: EQ Char	D2 ID		D2 Char	/Class Ziltus		tyronelee
ygData.messageBody:
Since D2 use acct name (instead of char name) to send tell, maybe we can
maintain a list here:

EQ Char D2 ID D2 Char /Class
Ziltus tyronelee Apathaz/barbarian
Leshrec leshrec Yvonne/amazon
Kellendil kelvinchua ???/necromancer

Btw, we play in Asia server, channel "Singapore" (this channel is on most
of the time, many local players).

I've tested both USeast and USwest server, seem like it's not much better
than Asia. Probably becoz there are many more players now than stress test
(but still have to blame that Korean server, down more than 1/2 of the
time). Seem like the 'server down' is becoz of our connection and not the
real server down. Someone say if u cannot open a game, try to join a
Korean game then quit and create your own one will help.

Btw Les and I in act 3 liao. As I didn't find much goodies, I spend most
of my money buying swords and test out their dam. My last buy is a great
helm, 22k which drain me dry up totally. Btw, all my resis is zero, my
gears are mainly with fastest run/walk, fastest hit recovery, increase
chances getting magical items, life regeneration and attacker kena hit by
spikes kind, no resis type. Maybe becoz of that I use TONS of potions, esp
healing potions. For every big fights (I use ard 10 healing potions).
Does resis really help?

Oh yes, seem like it's more powerful using 1 fast/heavy dam weap than 2
very fast/medium dam weap? Also swords got more varity right? My barb
only train in sword mastery...

Ziltus

p/s: Les, I just noticed the crystal sword only has 10 druability, no
wonder it breaks down so often. But its dam is the highest I got so far.
